content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #130

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh
Chapter/section: Subscription Request
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Correction

Summary: Enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader

Comment: "with the following parameters, authenticating with the Bearer access token."

Not a clear sentence. I suggest to enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader.

Existing wording: To create a subscription, the subscribing app performs an HTTP POST (RFC7231) to the Hub's base url (as specified in cast-hub) with the following parameters, authenticating with the Bearer access token.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh
Chapter/section: Subscription Request
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Correction

Summary: Enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader

Comment: "with the following parameters, authenticating with the Bearer access token."

Not a clear sentence. I suggest to enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader.

Existing wording: To create a subscription, the subscribing app performs an HTTP POST (RFC7231) to the Hub's base url (as specified in cast-hub) with the following parameters, authenticating with the Bearer access token.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #130:

Hey @bvdh, do you have a suggested wording for this?

How about:
Proposed wording: To create a subscription, the subscribing authenticates with the Bearer access token as part of an HTTP POST (RFC7231) to the Hub's base url (as specified in cast-hub) with the following parameters.

bvdh commented on Issue #130:

The sentence is better.

In line with #118, this should be revised to:
To create a subscription, the subscribing SHALL perform an HTTP POST (RFC7231) to the Hub's base url (as specified in cast-hub) with the following parameters.
...
after table
....
In OAuth2 authentication is used (as is recommended), this POST request SHALL contain the Bearer access token.

wmaethner labeled Issue #130:

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh
Chapter/section: Subscription Request
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Correction

Summary: Enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader

Comment: "with the following parameters, authenticating with the Bearer access token."

Not a clear sentence. I suggest to enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader.

Existing wording: To create a subscription, the subscribing app performs an HTTP POST (RFC7231) to the Hub's base url (as specified in cast-hub) with the following parameters, authenticating with the Bearer access token.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #130:

## :telephone_receiver: II Working Group Vote (5-30-2019)

Meeting notes: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/IMIN/Teleconferences

Martin Bellehumeur moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment: Will do as suggested by @bvdh, like so:

To create a subscription, the subscribing SHALL perform an HTTP POST (RFC7231) to the Hub's base url (as specified in cast-hub) with the following parameters.
...
after table
....
If OAuth2 authentication is used, this POST request SHALL contain the Bearer access token in the HTTP Authorization header.

:+1: For: 8
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
